long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save text to notes and it will save the text & url for future reference with a single click.
Features : 
- Note creation & deletion
- Saving text to notes via selector on screen 
- Select active note for saving text with mouse
- Keeps page url in selected text for future reference
- Summarize notes with AI

Future updates : 
- Query notes with AI
- Connect notes to own db with API
